data.eml:eml: Myzostoma khanhkhoaensis (Myzostomida), a new myzostomid species from the Nhatrang Bay, Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kolbasova, Glafira D., Mekhova, Elena S. (2019): Myzostoma khanhkhoaensis (Myzostomida), a new myzostomid species from the Nhatrang Bay, Vietnam. Zootaxa 4691 (3): 235-249, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4691.3.4
